AsyncCallbackWithExecutor<T> - Interface in org.objectfabric

atomic(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.TObject
Shortcut to Workspace.atomic(Runnable).
atomic(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.Workspace
Executes the runnable in the context of a transaction, which is a stable snapshot of all workspace objects.
atomicRead(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.TObject
Shortcut to Workspace.atomicRead(Runnable).
atomicRead(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.Workspace
Same as atomic, but the transaction is only allowed to read objects.
atomicWrite(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.TObject
Shortcut to Workspace.atomicWrite(Runnable).
atomicWrite(Runnable) - Method in class org.objectfabric.Workspace
Same as atomic, but the transaction does not keep track of its reads.
